channel.title: CVE Feed for ka-yue -- Auto Featured Image
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ka-yue -- Auto Featured Image

item.title: CVE-2024-6054|2024-08-01T21:25:03.219Z -- ka-yue -- auto%20featured%20image
item.description: The Auto Featured Image plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the 'create_post_attachment_from_url' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level and above permissions, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-6054|2024-07-03T19:10:06.743Z -- ka-yue -- auto%20featured%20image
item.description: The Auto Featured Image plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the 'create_post_attachment_from_url' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level and above permissions, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.
